https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/p1LbrdJ53dGfEhRopG71akfzOVu.jpg Set in a post-apocalyptic world where a global airborne pandemic has wiped out 90% of the Earth's population and only the young and immune have endured as scavengers. For Ellie and Quinn, the daily challenges to stay alive are compounded when they become hunted by the merciless Stalkers. After the Pandemic
